about.details:
Founded in June 2013, Chamunda Electricals Limited specializes in operating and maintaining up to 66 KV substations, testing and commissioning for up to 220 KV substations, and 1.5 MW solar power generation. The company's services include erecting EHV class equipment, structures, earthing, control cable works, and other associated tasks for up to 220 KV (D Class) substations.

The company has a team of more than 600 engineers, supervisors and other supporting staff well-equipped to handle complex projects with a high degree of accuracy.

The company's business can be divided into the following categories

  1. Operation, Maintenance, Testing & Commissioning of Electrical Sub-stations
  2. Set up a solar power generation park
  3. Installation and commissioning of electrical equipment designed to operate at voltages typically up to 220 kV

As on December 31, 2024, the company had 637 full-time employees.

Competitive Strength

  • Decade long years of industry experience with strong execution capabilities
  • Strong Promoters and Board of Directors supported by an experienced senior management team
  • Advanced Equipment & Skilled Workforce for Precision
  • Scalable Business Model with a strong work order book

faqs.question: What is the Chamunda Electrical IPO?
faqs.answer:
Chamunda Electrical IPO is a SME IPO of 2919000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹14.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹50 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on February 4, 2025, and closes on February 6, 2025.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Chamunda Electrical IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Chamunda Electrical IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Chamunda Electrical IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Chamunda Electrical IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Chamunda Electrical IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Chamunda Electrical IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Chamunda Electrical IPO opens on February 4, 2025 and closes on February 6, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Chamunda Electrical IPO?
faqs.answer: Chamunda Electrical IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,50,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Chamunda Electrical IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Chamunda Electrical IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Chamunda Electrical IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Chamunda Electrical IPO will be done on Friday, February 7, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, February 10, 2025. Check the Chamunda Electrical IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Chamunda Electrical IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Chamunda Electrical IPO listing date is on Tuesday, February 11, 2025.
